type DocumentDesigner = class inherit ScrollableControlDesigner interface IRootDesigner interface IDesigner interface IDisposable interface IToolboxUser

summary.span: 设计器基类，用于扩展支持嵌套控件并应接收滚动消息的 的设计模式行为，并为其提供根级别设计模式视图。

span.span: Base designer class for extending the design mode behavior of, and providing a root-level design mode view for, a that supports nested controls and should receive scroll messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此设计器是一个根设计器，这意味着在设计模式下查看关联的文档时，它为其提供根级别设计模式视图。This designer is a root designer, meaning that it provides the root-level design mode view for the associated document when it is viewed in design mode. 可以使用将设计器与类型相关联 。You can associate a designer with a type using a . 有关自定义设计时行为的概述，请参阅 [扩展 Design-Time 支持](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2010/37899azc(v=vs.100))。For an overview of customizing design time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2010/37899azc(v=vs.100)).

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Dispose`在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 true 时，此方法释放该引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源 。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 当重写时， 请注意不要引用先前在调用时已释放的对象 。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 指示设计器是否支持指定的工具。

span.span: Indicates whether the specified tool is supported by the designer.

returns.span: 如果应在工具箱上启用该工具，则为 ；如果文档设计器不知道如何使用该工具，则为 。

span.span: if the tool should be enabled on the toolbox; if the document designer doesn't know how to use the tool.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果支持某一工具，则当设计器接收到焦点时，它将在 "工具箱" 中启用。If a tool is supported, it will be enabled in the toolbox when the designer receives focus. 否则，将禁用该功能。Otherwise, it will be disabled. 将工具标记为启用或禁用后，不能再对其进行查询。Once a tool is marked as enabled or disabled it can not be queried again.
